name: prompt-pack
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; npm i -g @redocly/openapi-cli openapi-diff; GOBIN=$(go env GOPATH)/bin GO111MODULE=on go install github.com/oapi-codegen/oapi-codegen/v2/cmd/oapi-codegen@v2.5.1; GOBIN=$(go env GOPATH)/bin go install github.com/air-verse/air@latest; echo "export PATH=\$PATH:$(go env GOPATH)/bin" >> ~/.bashrc || true; echo "export PATH=\$PATH:$(go env GOPATH)/bin" >> ~/.zshrc || true'
